page.title: 02Horses
page.content:
There is a stud farm on Ridgehill which also delivers horses. It has its own riding school and show jumping team. There's a practice paddock and a large field that is used for annual show jumping events during the summer.
Adjoining Mimms Hall was a livery stables, looking after horses for local residents and others.
There were other fields in the area full of horses. There are lots of pony-trekking tracks and bridle paths all over the area, but this is not because the local residents are poor - lots of the houses had two cars.
